ConvenientEffects.SettingAppControlsPerm: This defines the minimum permission level to see and apply Convenient Effects through the application via the button on token controls. Setting this to None will disable the button entirely.
ConvenientEffects.SettingCreateFoldersPe: This defines the minimum permission level to create new effect folders in the Convenient Effects application. Setting this to None will disable the create button entirely. Note that a user must also have the Foundry permission to create items in order for this to work.
